title: Altitude Purchases +165,000t Of Carbon Removal From South American Partners Ecogaia & Emisiones Neutras
description:
Carbon removal financier Altitude has agreed to purchase more than 165,000 tonnes of CO₂ Removal Certificates (CORCs) from biochar-based carbon removal facilities in Argentina operated by EcoGaia and Emisiones Neutras. This makes Altitude one of the worlds largest buyers of CDR. The deal will see CORCs, issued through the Puro ... [continued]

The post Altitude Purchases +165,000t Of Carbon Removal From South American Partners Ecogaia & Emisiones Neutras appeared first on CleanTechnica.
